description:
AuctionHouse._auctionEnded(uint256) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#266-270) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- $.auctions[auctionId].endTime < block.timestamp (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#269)
markdown:
[AuctionHouse._auctionEnded(uint256)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L266-L270) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [$.auctions[auctionId].endTime < block.timestamp](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L269)

description:
AuctionHouse._requireValidEndTime(uint256) (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#284-288) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- endTime <= block.timestamp (contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#285)
markdown:
[AuctionHouse._requireValidEndTime(uint256)](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L284-L288) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [endTime <= block.timestamp](contracts/auction-house/AuctionHouse.sol#L285)

description:
EIP712._requireValidSignature(address,bytes32,uint256,bytes) (contracts/utils/EIP712.sol#44-60) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- deadline < block.timestamp (contracts/utils/EIP712.sol#50)
markdown:
[EIP712._requireValidSignature(address,bytes32,uint256,bytes)](contracts/utils/EIP712.sol#L44-L60) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [deadline < block.timestamp](contracts/utils/EIP712.sol#L50)
